subject: Negotiation
title: Why Culture Shapes Every Deal
description: A 60-second lesson on Why Culture Shapes Every Deal.

discovery.text: What counts as 'agreement' varies. A handshake in the US is binding; in Japan, it may mean 'we'll consider it.'
